text:
Hey folks, I assume almost everybody here knows, that you can view/access them via <http://app.HubSpot.com|app.HubSpot.com>.
And once you're working for a decent amount of time as a partner/admin, you have quite a lot of portals listed there. This view can clutter and hasn't got some love in the last couple of years...
Therefore I've created an idea how this page could be made better.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Portal-overview-optimization/idi-p/1021350/highlight/true>

If you like this idea - give it a thumbs up
